creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: nine separate scenes from the Tale of Genji arranged between golden clouds and gnarled pine trees; many scenes take place indoors between couples and women, with a few out of doors scenes
medium: Eight-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold on gilded paper
signed: LRC: Sōtatsu Hokkyō 宗達法橋
title: Nine Scenes from the Tale of Genji
